title: var vs. const and let
content: var is function scoped, let and const are block scoped, which means they are scoped to {}.

title: Template Literals
content: Who else loves the back tick `? If you do not know, template literals allow you to write other documents syntax inside javaScript using ``. To refer a variable from javaScript inside a literal use ${}.

title: Simplified ? if : else statement
content: This is a short way to write if/else statement. What is left of the questions mark is the condition, the : separates the if and the if else.
